ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: RgDaN, you write something like that one more time and I m going to moderate you. The hole was covered by Scavanger and Breakdown (not to mention a blast door

Subject: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

RgDaN, you write something like that one more time and I'm going to moderate 
you. The hole was covered by Scavanger and Breakdown (not to mention a blast 
door or two), and the brig isn't made of mirror coated graphite.

::Punch/Scattershot/The Oblitercons::

Punch grunts as Tigerhawk's hologram laughs at him. "He might have escaped, 
but we have the two females."

He looks at Dark One and Pyro, seeing a shadowy figure with Dark One's gun 
pressed to her head (Iron Raptor under effect of the holodram). He looks over 
at Tavatron, grinning as an idea occurrs to him.

"These two will be sorry that fool attemped to rescue them," he says, evil in 
his voice. Punch points to Tavatron, "Drag that one to the torture chamber. 
And take the other one too. She'll watch."

Dark One nods, smiling as he and Pyro begin to drag Iron Raptor and Tavatron 
to the torture chambers. Punch turns to accompany them.

"Scattershot, Breakdown, Scavanger, Hiss, repair that hole."

The bots get down to their assigned task.
